title: FM chairs meeting of first ministerial task force of commonwealth youth ministers
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 15 (APP):Caretaker Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani on Friday chaired a meeting of new members of the first ministerial task force of the 10th Commonwealth Youth Ministers’ moot in London.
The task force agreed upon its priorities and the future framework. It was also agreed that in future the youth affairs would be kept among top priorities of the government, a press release issued by the Foreign Office spokesperson said.
The delegates appreciated the foreign minister for successfully chairing the 10th Commonwealth Youth Ministers’ meeting.
